title: Chicken parmigiana
ingredients: ['2 tbsp olive oil', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '200g small mushrooms, quartered', '1 large aubergine, diced', '450g plum tomatoes, roughly chopped', '15g fresh basil, roughly torn', '4 skinless, chicken breast fillets, about 500g in total', '2 tbsp freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
